Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.core.declarative

Interface DeclarationsRegistryApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeclarationsRegistry
public sealed interface DeclarationsRegistryApi permits DeclarationsRegistry
API interface for DeclarationsRegistry used within the framework structure.

    • getGlobalModelMapperForModels

      <S, T> Optional<ModelMapper<S,T>> getGlobalModelMapperForModels(Class<S> sourceModelClass, Class<T> targetModelClass)
      If exists, returns a ModelMapper for that can map from the given sourceModelClass to targetModelClass.
      Type Parameters:
      S - Connector model type
      T - Scenario model type
      Parameters:
      sourceModelClass - Source model class
      targetModelClass - Target model class
      Returns:
      If exists, returns a ModelMapper for the given model classes
